name: Autosprite
tag_list: automitve, cars, car-owners, auto-repair-shops, auto-insurance, time-management-for-auto-repair-shops
overview:
Autosprite is a platform simplifying interaction between car owners and automotive aftermarket companies (auto repair shops, accessory and spare part suppliers, insurance companies).

For car owners, Autosprite provides the single point of service, which allows to book a time in a service center, to find and order accessories suitable for the car, to calculate and order insurance. Also the service provides all the necessary information about the car and its operation and notify car owners about upcoming maintenance and other important activities (notifications include deals, which Autosprite requests for its partners beforehand).

The service centers (auto repair shops, car wash, etc) are able to publish information about their services, to manage time bookings, to send repair reports and recommendations regarding upcoming maintenance and repair. The shops are able to manage their “online stocks” and process orders. The insurance companies and brokers are able to process orders. The service can be integrated with the partners’ ERPs (internally used systems).

Autosprite provides advanced online time management software (SaaS) designed specially for auto repair shops and according to their needs. This software is crucial for organizing smooth, well functioning and really online process of time booking to auto service centers, which is very much demanded by car owners, but lacking on most of the sites.

Currently Autosprite is publicly available for car owners only in Russian (at http://autosprite.ru/), primarily serving people living in Saint-Petersburg and the region. But our goal is to become number one service for car owners around Europe, so we are constantly looking for partners, which are willing to share our success by bringing Autosprite to their area. English version of Autosprite service for car owners is available at http://autosprite.com/ for registered users only. If you want to sign up please request in an invitation or go to Autosprite application on Facebook.

Autosprite Co. Ltd. is a Russian start-up company based in Saint-Petersburg. The company has been founded in November 2011.
